Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster
Date: Wed, 17 Jan 2001 19:38:36 -0500
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Priority: 3
X-MSMail-Priority: Normal
X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 5.00.3018.1300
X-Mimeole: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V5.00.3018.1300
From: "SOULSTICE" <thecode@...>

Shokaract took each blast with ease.

Shokaract: You underestimate my power. You shall be incinerated. I command
you to fire, Mob!

Shokaract fired his 3 missiles at  Necromancer.

Gigas threw a boulder, seemingly that he created, at Necromancer.

Kracken raised his many tentacles and started firing machine gun style from
them.

Horn Drill fired 2 horn missiles at Necromancer.

Grenade fired his machine gun rapidly at Necromancer, since he seemed to be
resistant to fire.

Beholder 2 shot 2 missiles at Necromancer...

----- Original Message -----
From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 10:19 AM
Subject: Re: Necromancer's fight with Mobster


> > Shokaract over commlink to Zardus: Zardus, are we firing again?..
>
> .
> Necromancer lost his patience with the situation, "No you're dieing." he
> fired five fireballs at Shockarackt, smiling as the weapon recoiled with
> each shot.
>
>

too

he
> > was
> > > curious about what the answer would be but  soon realised that it
wasn't

of
> > > here." The bot wasn't happy about the abuse he'd taken earlier, and
> didn't
> > > want to give any of these bots the chance to do more damage.

They
> > were

to
> > much
> > > > > > > treachery from your kind to believe that a cease fire will
ever
> be
> > > > > > > honored. Now take your lackeys and leave or I WILL make sure

> > > you
> > > > > > > can't return to anywhere."
